articles.title: A first look at Kojima’s OD Xbox game
articles.description: Hideo Kojima first announced he was teaming up with Xbox for a new game in 2022, before a teaser revealed the OD name and some cast last year. articles.title: Palworld is getting a farming spinoff
articles.description: Palworld won’t hit 1.0 until next year, but developer Pocketpair is already announcing a farming spinoff: Palworld: Palfarm.
